title: Reversing Numbers in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of reversing a number in JavaScript. We will learn how to use built-in methods such as split(), reverse(), and join() to achieve this task. By the end of this lab, you will have a deeper understanding of how to manipulate numbers in JavaScript.

meta.title: Reverse Numbers in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the art of reversing numbers in JavaScript. Learn to use built-in methods like split(), reverse(), and join() to achieve this task.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, number reversal, javascript practice online, coding, javascript lab, tutorial, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在JavaScript中反转数字
